pr_title: #14860 Service Bus Queue Binder Support Dead Letter Queue

timeline.message: #14860 Service Bus MQ Binder Support Dead Letter Queue
#14860 Service Bus Queue Binder Support Dead Letter Queue

timeline.bodyText: @chenghaoharvey Thanks for your great effort. I just have one concern that need the ErrorMessageStrategy be hard coded?
timeline.author: yiliuTo

replies.bodyText:
i just refer to rabbit mq implementation.
you mean that message strategy should not be hard coded and user can config it by themselves?
Or i just return new ErrorMessageStrategy() directly?
replies.author: chenghaoharvey

replies.bodyText: @yiliuTo may i have your input? I referred to Rabbit MQ binder and they are hard code as well.
replies.author: chenghaoharvey

replies.bodyText: I am so sorry that I have ignored this notification for so many days==. After investigating code of ErrorMessageStrategy from both Rabbit MQ binder and azure0-spring-integration-core project, I think it makes sense to leave it as hard coded.
replies.author: yiliuTo
